Package Audio

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrangementHelper
    Class to handle simple audio arrangement functionality such as editing the length of an audio track, adding padding to the start/end of an audio track etc.
    AudioData  
    AudioProcessing
    Any audio to be processed will be done in this intermediate class.
    BitDepthConverter
    Class can convert files from 16-bit to 24-bit or vice versa.
    BPMConverter  
    ByteToFloat
    Class converts an byte array to a float array and vice versa.
    DirectoryPlayer  
    FadeManager  
    MixerSetUp
    MixerSetUp class represents a 32 channel mixer than may consist of one or or more lines of data.
    OutputTrack
    Output Track inherits attributes from Track such as set up of Data Line and playback.
    StereoSplit
    Splits a stereo audio file in to two mono arrays (left and right).
    Timing
    Timer for beats and bars and seconds
    Track
    Track/channel class represents a given line of data within a mixer.
